sentences.english: I built my hut near the Congo and it lulled me to sleep.
sentences.chinese: 我在剛果河畔蓋起我的小屋，它催我醺醺入睡。

sentences.english: There is high risk of the epidemic further spreading along the Congo River.
sentences.chinese: 疫情沿剛果河進一步蔓延的風險很高。

sentences.english: HIV can be traced back to villages along the Congo River in the 1950's.
sentences.chinese: 愛滋病最早的記錄停留在1950年代的剛果河流域。

sentences.english: Too much rain is the problem of the equatorial lands in the Amazon and Congo basins.
sentences.chinese: 雨水過多是亞馬遜河與剛果河流域赤道地區的大問題。

sentences.english: They travelled down the River Congo.
sentences.chinese: 他們沿剛果河順流而下。
